about_the_game:
This is a collection of animated resource pack depicting the interior design of a Magical Item Shop!
Get this pack for an added sense of playfulness and mysticalness to the shop to really make things feel “magical”!


*******************************************
■Contents
・Characters: 8 sheets, 35 items (30 background animation materials, 5 walking characters)
・Tiles: 3 sheets, 6 items (floor, wall, desk, chair)
・Sample map (with animation)

※Please note that although “Background animations” are interior materials, they are found under “Characters” due to the use of loop trigger animations.
*******************************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
